scripts.render:all: npm run render:readme && npm run render:full && npm run render:proposed && npm run render:accepted && npm run render:closed
scripts.render:readme: node inject-table.js ../../README.md -s unknown -s implementing -s planning -s approved -s final-comment-period -s api-approved -s review
scripts.render:proposed: node inject-table.js ../../PROPOSED.md -s proposed -s review -s api-approved -s final-comment-period
scripts.render:accepted: node inject-table.js ../../ACCEPTED.md -s approved -s planning -s implementing -s done
